messages.text: Hi Alex! Welcome to VoiceUp Support. How can I help you?
My internet keeps disconnecting and it's really frustrating!
I'm so sorry for the inconvenience, Alex. Let me check this for you.
Thanks, I hope it gets fixed soon.
I have reset your connection. Could you please check now?
Yes, it's working now. Thank you!
Hello, how can I assist you today?
My router is showing a red light and no internet.
No worries, our routers usually fix themselves in a few minutes.
Are you sure? This has been happening for an hour.
Guaranteed it will be fine soon!
Hello! How can I help you today?
My connection drops every 10 minutes and this is ridiculous.
It might be a temporary glitch. Please wait and see.
I’ve been waiting for hours. This is the third time this week!
We’ll look into it. Goodbye.
Unbelievable. Worst support ever.
Hi Sam! Welcome to VoiceUp Support. How can I help you?
I’m facing issues with my billing.
I'm sorry to hear that, Sam. Let me check your account.
Thanks!
It’s sorted now, please check your email for the corrected invoice.
Got it. Appreciate the quick help!
Hello Lisa! What can I help you with today?
Just wanted to know my current plan details.
Sure, you're on the Silver Plan with 200 Mbps.
Perfect, thanks a lot!
Hi Kevin! VoiceUp Support here. What seems to be the problem?
I can’t access the internet since morning.
Apologies for the trouble. I've reset your router remotely.
It’s back! Thank you so much!
Glad to help. Have a great day, Kevin!
Hey Anna, this is Mark from VoiceUp. How may I assist you?
Your team is awesome! Just wanted to say thanks!
That means a lot! We're always here to help.
Hi John, how can I assist?
No issue. Just needed to update my address.
Done. Your address has been updated.
Cool. Thanks.
Hello! This is VoiceUp Support.
Why do I keep getting disconnected every night??!
We’re looking into it.
You said the same thing yesterday.
Please bear with us.
Ugh, so frustrating.
